    {"s":"X-ray imaging", "p":"uses", "o":"X-ray radiography", "modalities":["text"], "confidence":1.0, "evidence":"Fast forward to today, and X-ray imaging—specifically X-ray radiography—is one of the most common tools used in hospitals and clinics around the world."},
    {"s":"mammography", "p":"is", "o":"a specialized type of X-ray radiography", "modalities":["text"], "confidence":1.0, "evidence":"Or in breast cancer screening, mammography—a specialized type of X-ray radiography—can reveal tiny calcifications or early tumors that might not be detectable by touch."},
    {"s":"X-ray radiographs", "p":"are", "o":"2D projections", "modalities":["text"], "confidence":1.0, "evidence":"But there’s a limitation with X-ray radiographs. They’re 2D projections, so everything in the body along the X-ray path gets stacked into one image."},

evidence: But there’s a limitation with X-ray radiographs. They’re 2D projections, so everything in the body along the X-ray path gets stacked into one image.
